text: Unionicolidae is a family of prostigs in the order Trombidiformes. There are about 5 genera and at least 40 described species in Unionicolidae. ==Genera== * Huitfeldtia Thor, 1898 * Koenikea Wolcott, 1900 * Najadicola Piersig, 1897 * Neumania Lebert, 1879 * Unionicola Haldeman, 1842 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Trombidiformes
title: Unionicolidae
